content:
Give agents access to Einstein Reply Recommendations by assigning them a permission set.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions. Einstein Reply Recommendations is included in the Einstein for Service add-on license.

To assign permission sets: Assign Permission Sets.
Decide which agents should see reply recommendations during chats and messaging sessions.
Assign the Einstein Reply Recommendations User permission set to the identified agents.
Give the agents read access to the quick text folder containing published replies.
Reply recommendations appear in the Einstein Replies component, which appears automatically on Chat and Messaging console pages for users with the Einstein Reply Recommendations User permission set.

To customize the Einstein Replies component:
Open the Chat and Messaging pages in the Lightning App Builder.
Update its settings on each layout.
To add the Einstein Replies component to the Lightning Service Console manually:
From Setup, enter App Manager in the Quick Find box and select App Manager.
Click Save.
title: Giving Agents Access to Einstein Reply Recommendations
